abstract: Citigroup is said to have been expecting to sell its EMI Group for $4 billion, but offers, with banks less willing to finance bids, are said to be substantially less.
snippet: Citigroup expected to sell the music company for $4 billion. But with fewer banks willing to finance bids, offers are said to be substantially less.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup expected to sell the music company for $4 billion. But with fewer banks willing to finance bids, offers are said to be substantially less.

headline.main: Bids to Buy Citigroup’s EMI Group Are Said to Fall Short of Expectations
headline.print_headline: Bids to Buy Citigroup’s EMI Group Are Said to Fall Short of Expectations
